name: Cherenrad Tech Demo
description:
This project was OVERLY inspired, to the detriment of the final submission!

Inspiration: Microsoft Flight Simulator and this video on procedural leg movement:

The plan was a VR game where a spider tank works with towers to defend a procedurally generated town against a horde of kaiju. The player controlled the tank in VR through instrument panels.

The amount of work necessary to make a horde of kaiju fight a procedurally generated town was VASTLY underestimated and that development effort was all that made it into the jam submission. So, the end result is a tech demo of a VR spider tank project, featuring no VR and no spider tank.

Pre-made assets: Models were created prior to the jam start date.
